about_the_game:
Do you like the sea? Maldives has beautiful white sandy beaches, Tiffany blue sea, and glass-like transparent water. I also love the sea, so I tried to put this beauty into the game so that we can walk on this beautiful beach again at any time.

This is a large sea area, and you are the only owner. Here you can walk, run, swim, and enjoy the sunrise at the beach at any time. You can explore and enjoy the scenery of different islands. There are no tasks, no battles, no enemies, and no dangers. You can even breathe underwater. Everything is harmonious and beautiful. You have complete freedom. It is the perfect ocean paradise.

short_description: This is a beautiful paradise on the sea. The white sand beach is breathtaking, the sea is Tiffany blue and the water is as clear as a mirror. You can walk, run, swim and enjoy the sunrise on the beach at any time. There is no work and no worries here. You can just immerse yourself in this beauty.
